description: Try our easy to follow Chicken, Spinach & Ricotta Pithivier recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken, Spinach & Ricotta Pithivier Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tsp extra virgin light olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 25-30 minutes or until golden. Allow to cool slightly before slicing. Serve with a fresh green salad.
